name: Rebrand LeadConnector Lite
author: RebrandPress

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress(This will add new Sub Menu in admin panel’s side menu name Rebrand` under Lead Connector menu).
  3. Go to Lead Connector > Rebrand
sections.faq:
1. Is the Rebrand LeadConector plugin free?
    -Yes, we have a lite version of the Rebrand LeadConector plugin with limited features. If you want to take advantage of all the premium features you’ll need to purchase a Pro license.

  2. Can you use the Rebrand LeadConnector plugin on the free version of LeadConnector?
    -Yes, it will work with both free version and pro version.

  3. Does it work with any WordPress theme?
    -Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

  4. Does it work with any WordPress page builder?
    -Yes, it will work with any WordPress page builder.

  5. How many websites can I connect Rebrand LeadConnector to?
    -You can connect the lite version to as many websites you would like. If you want to use the Pro features, you’ll have to select the plan that fits your needs best.

  6. Where can I get support?
    -You can post your question on the support forum here: https://help.rebrandpress.com
sections.description: LeadConnector allows you to integrate CRM and conversational tools to your WordPress website. Customize your LeadConnector and change the button colors, tiles, and links to fit your own brand. You are able to change the name and description, removing all mention of LeadConnector, and even remove the “rebrand” option so clients don’t see.

description: LeadConnector allows you to integrate CRM and conversational tools to your WordPress website. Customize your LeadConnector and change the button colors, tiles, and links to fit your own brand. You are able to change the name and description, removing all mention of LeadConnector, and even remove the “rebrand” option so clients don’t see.
